item.title: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN)
item.description: Convolutional Neural Networks Authors: Elias Baumann, Franko Maximilian HÃ¶lzig, Josef Lorenz Rumberger Table of Content Motivation Images Artificial Neural Networks Convolutional Neural Networks Architecture Overview Layers 7.
